comment: There is a good bit of work.  Super nice.  She has a lot of experience, but I wish she share more of it.  By the end of the class you will have a good understanding of project mgnt.  Keep up with the work and you will do fine.

Mrs. Warner knows her stuff. She gives a lot of work, but gives you ample opportunity to pass her classes. She will work with you and extend deadlines if you missed work. She truly wants you to know the work. Once in a while, she gets tough on grading. She prepares you to graduate level writing. She's by far the most flexible and caring professor.
